actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to clear title to certain lands along the California-Nevada boundary.

summary.text: Confirms the validity of all real property conveyances by the United States under specified statutes to California and Nevada, on or before July 7, 1980, even though certain properties conveyed to one State are now located in the other because of the boundary newly determined by the U.S. Supreme Court in the case of California v. Nevada, (433 U.S. 918), 1980.

titles.title: A bill to clear title to certain lands along the California-Nevada boundary.
